name: Tables and Pots
description:
Your tables and pots! Candy Corns have entered your realm, and don't like how "neat" it looks! Try cleaning up while they're flipping everything around!

WASD to move, Spacebar to pickup/drop

Things to note:

This was made for OpposingGameJam in two days, and so I didn't have time to implement a score system (or a real game loop). Will do in 2 days I promise. Also the candy corns might get stuck in a table near the wall. Push them away and grab the table.
